CustomField.description: Looks at the record type to determine if the registration account references a person or a business. This determines what type of account is created when the registration is approved.
CustomField.formula: IF ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agent' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Management_Individual' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Sole_Proprietorship' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Individual_Permit' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Parent_Guardian', TRUE , FALSE )
CustomField.label: IsPerson
